Philemon’s Faith and Love

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w thank|strong="G2168"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, remembering \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w*,

Paul’s Appeal for Onesimus

\w So|strong="G1352"\w* although \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w I|strong="G1352"\w* \w am|strong="G2192"\w* \w bold|strong="G3954"\w* \w enough|strong="G4183"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w order|strong="G2004"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w do|strong="G2192"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* proper,

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w appeal|strong="G3870"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w child|strong="G5043"\w* \w Onesimus|strong="G3682"\w*,\f + \fr 1:10 \ft Onesimus means useful (see verse 11) or beneficial (see verse 20).\f* \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w father|strong="G1080"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w became|strong="G1080"\w* \w while|strong="G1722"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w chains|strong="G1199"\w*.

\w Formerly|strong="G4218"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* useless \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w has|strong="G3739"\w* \w become|strong="G1161"\w* \w useful|strong="G2173"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w I|strong="G3778"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* sending back \w to|strong="G3778"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w very|strong="G3778"\w* \w heart|strong="G4698"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w would|strong="G1014"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* liked \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w keep|strong="G2722"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G1722"\w* \w behalf|strong="G5228"\w* \w he|strong="G3739"\w* \w could|strong="G3588"\w* \w minister|strong="G1247"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w chains|strong="G1199"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1161"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w want|strong="G2309"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w anything|strong="G3762"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w your|strong="G4674"\w* \w consent|strong="G1106"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w your|strong="G4674"\w* goodness \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w out|strong="G2596"\w* \w of|strong="G2596"\w* compulsion, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w your|strong="G4674"\w* \w own|strong="G4674"\w* \w free|strong="G1595"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w perhaps|strong="G5029"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w why|strong="G1223"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G5610"\w* \w separated|strong="G5563"\w* \w from|strong="G1223"\w* \w you|strong="G3778"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w a|strong="G4314"\w* \w while|strong="G5610"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G3778"\w* \w might|strong="G5610"\w* \w have|strong="G3778"\w* \w him|strong="G4314"\w* \w back|strong="G4314"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w good|strong="G1223"\w*—

\w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w longer|strong="G2089"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w slave|strong="G1401"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w better|strong="G3123"\w* \w than|strong="G5228"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w slave|strong="G1401"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* beloved brother. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G2962"\w* \w especially|strong="G3122"\w* beloved \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* person \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w consider|strong="G2192"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w partner|strong="G2844"\w*, \w receive|strong="G4355"\w* \w him|strong="G4355"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* would \w receive|strong="G4355"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w has|strong="G3778"\w* wronged \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w in|strong="G1161"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w way|strong="G5100"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w owes|strong="G3784"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w anything|strong="G5100"\w*, \w charge|strong="G1677"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G5100"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w account|strong="G1677"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w own|strong="G1699"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*. \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* repay \w it|strong="G2532"\w*—\w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w mention|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w owe|strong="G4359"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w very|strong="G2532"\w* \w self|strong="G4572"\w*.

\w Yes|strong="G3483"\w*, brother, \w let|strong="G3685"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w benefit|strong="G3685"\w* \f + \fr 1:20 \ft Greek onaimēn, a play on the name Onesimus\f* \w from|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. Refresh \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w heart|strong="G4698"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Confident|strong="G3982"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w*, \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w more|strong="G5228"\w* \w than|strong="G5228"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w ask|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w In|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* meantime, \w prepare|strong="G2090"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* guest room \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w hope|strong="G1679"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w your|strong="G1223"\w* \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* restored \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*. Additional Greetings

\w Epaphras|strong="G1889"\w*, \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w fellow|strong="G4869"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G4869"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, sends \w you|strong="G4771"\w* greetings,

\w as|strong="G3588"\w* \w do|strong="G3588"\w* \w Mark|strong="G3138"\w*, Aristarchus, \w Demas|strong="G1214"\w*, \w and|strong="G3588"\w* \w Luke|strong="G3065"\w*, \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w fellow|strong="G4904"\w* \w workers|strong="G4904"\w*.
